original_text: And he did what was evil in the sight of the Lord, according to all that his fathers had done.
korean_text: 여호아하스가 그의 조상들의 모든 행위대로 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하였더니

sentences.original_text: And he did what was evil in the sight of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 여호와 보시기에 악한 일을 행하였고

sentences.original_text: according to all that his fathers had done.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 조상들이 행한 모든 것과 같이 하였더라
